execution_plan.description: Read items (receipt -> item) from the items database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT items.Receipt AS s1__Receipt, items.Item AS s1__Item FROM items;

execution_plan.description: Read receipts (receipt number -> customer) for receipts referenced by items.
execution_plan.query: SELECT receipts.ReceiptNumber AS s2__ReceiptNumber, receipts.CustomerId AS s2__CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE receipts.ReceiptNumber IN ($step1.s1__Receipt);

execution_plan.description: Read goods (id -> food) for items referenced by the items table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT goods.id AS s3__id, goods.food AS s3__food FROM goods WHERE goods.id IN ($step1.s1__Item);
